articles.description: Jefferies also has a 'Buy' stance on the Bajaj Finance stock with a target of Rs 8,830 per share. Assuming Bajaj Finance raises 10-15 percent of net worth, the issue size may be Rs 8,000 crore to $1 billion, it said.
articles.content: Note To ReadersDisclosure: Reliance Industries Ltd, which owns Jio, is the sole beneficiary of Independent Media Trust that controls Network18, the parent company of CNBCTV18.com.
